BL
2018/KER/453
B.KEMAL PASHA, J.
Dated this the 5" day of January, 2018
ORDER
Petitioner is the 4 accused in C.P.No.230 of 2017 of
the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court, Kasaragod, which
has arisen from Crime No.48 of 2014 of Kasargod Police
Station, registered for the offences punishable under Sections
341, 323, 324, 308 and 153A IPC read with Section 34 IPC.

2. In the event of surrender of the petitioner before
the court below within 15 days from today, the court below
shall consider and dispose of the application seeking bail, if
any, that may be filed by the petitioner with advance notice to
the learned Assistant Public Prosecutor in charge of the case,
on the date of filing itself.

This Crl.M.C. is disposed of as above.

Sd/-
B.KEMAL PASHA
JUDGE
DSV/5/1/18
// True Copy /
P.A.To Judge
